data.text: @MIRisingAction @GovWhitmer Governor Whitmer followed the science and saved thousands of lives across our state. Once vaccines became widely available over a year ago, communities have had the freedom to decide what public health measures to use.

@MIRisingAction @GovWhitmer Thanks, GOP, for actively working against masks and social distancing and vaccines, then complaining as those public health policies are lifted. You're priceless -- if scum had a market.
@MIRisingAction @GovWhitmer Not really, but nice try. It’s based on several factors but your stable genius guru wanted everyone to die, and did a good job.
@MIRisingAction @GovWhitmer There haven’t been ANY state mandates in months 🙄
@MIRisingAction @GovWhitmer Pollsters? It's the numbers you blithering fool!
@IDntNderstnd @thompson_marv @MIRisingAction @stusandler @GovWhitmer What specifically was I saying was government overreach?
@MDFathon @thompson_marv @MIRisingAction @stusandler @GovWhitmer So it’s government overreach when she does something you don’t like, but not when she does something you want?
